name: Ducking Around
description:
Discover the loyal companions behind every successful hunter.

Work like dogs to collect all the ducks that "hunters" have shot in the NES classic Duck Hunt.

 

Race against your opponent to earn the most treats, by depositing ducks into your basket before duck season ends! 

Don't leave the ducks lying around for long, because they will start to spoil and will be worth less treats until they eventually go bad.  

You can also use your three (3) barks to strategically freeze your opponent in their tracks while you collect their loot. 

To up the ante, super ducks will sporadically fall from the sky and will give you a generous boost in points when deposited!



Player 1
  • A/D to Move Left/Right
  • S to Pickup/Drop ducks
  • A+S+D to Stun opponent
Player 2
  • J/L to Move Left/Right
  • K to Pickup/Drop ducks
  • J+K+L to Stun opponent

Programming:  Christa Buttera, Matt Donoghue, Braeden Timlin

Art/Assets: Ann Amin, Christa Buttera, Sabiha Mannan
